title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 653.2 - Persons excluded
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 653.2 - Persons excluded

State Regulations

The following are excluded from the bridges: (a) All persons other than pedestrians and
passengers in vehicles except by permission of the superintendent. (b) Pedestrians when, in the opinion of the
superintendent, snow or ice or any other condition makes the bridges
temporarily unsafe for foot passage. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
